tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodSouvenirs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  price DECIMAL,
  stock_quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name STRING,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL,
    location STRING
);

CREATE TABLE inventory (
  item_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name STRING,
  quantity INT,
  price DECIMAL,
  shop_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
  sale_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  item_id UUID REFERENCES inventory(item_id),
  shop_id UUID REFERENCES shops(shop_id),
  sale_date DATE,
  quantity_sold INT,
  total_price DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    shop_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity_sold INT NOT NULL,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
